raw_text:
• Add ﬂight ID tag to targets in the trafﬁc overlay.

• Cursor control to select any one trafﬁc target on the map:

• A Data Block will be present for the selected target on the Map

• The selected target is visually indicated via a spotlight on the HIS and Map.

• Cursor control to highlight trafﬁc.

• XPDR/TCAS RTSA format control to include basic (non-threat) targets in the trafﬁc overlay.

5th Edition 02 APR 19 5-187
